mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.yh_ref_owid AS "yhRefowid", a.lx AS "lx", a.kmbh AS "kmbh", a.kmsj AS "kmsj", a.kmdj AS "kmdj", a.kmcj AS "kmcj", a.xssx AS "xssx", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.creator AS "creator", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_cjxx( owid, yh_ref_owid, lx, kmbh, kmsj, kmdj, kmcj, xssx, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, creator, createtime, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{yhRefowid}, #{lx}, #{kmbh}, #{kmsj}, #{kmdj}, #{kmcj}, #{xssx}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{creator}, #{createtime}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_cjxx SET owid = #{owid}, yh_ref_owid =#{yhRefowid}, lx = #{lx}, kmbh = #{kmbh}, kmsj = #{kmsj}, kmdj = #{kmdj}, kmcj = #{kmcj}, xssx = #{xssx}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, creator = #{creator}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state} WHERE owid = #{owid}
